tool.name: Run FastQ Screen
tool.description: to check for contaminants in your sample
tool.help:
Run Fastq Screen as part of a QC pipeline.
fastq_screen allows you to take a sequence dataset and search it against a set of bowtie databases. It will then generate both a text and a graphical summary of the results to see if the sequence dataset contains the kind of sequences you expect or not.
Note that this tool assumes that you're using color space bowtie indexes.
